meanings.definition: A fine parchment made from the skin of a calf or lamb.
meanings.sent1: The ancient scroll was written on vellum.
meanings.sent2: The artist used vellum to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The chef wrapped the delicate dessert in vellum for a unique presentation.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as smooth as vellum, glowing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The vellum felt soft and luxurious to the touch.

meanings.definition: A type of high-quality paper resembling vellum.
meanings.sent1: The invitation was printed on vellum for an elegant touch.
meanings.sent2: The book cover had a vellum finish that added sophistication.
meanings.sent3: The office supplies were neatly organized, with vellum paper standing out.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight cast a silvery glow on the vellum pages of the novel.
meanings.sent5: The vellum texture gave the document a classic feel.
